entries.abort: Abort code received. Heading back to base.
entries.arrived_at_loc: The relic transport will arrive soon. Protect it as it calculates a lightspeed jump.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Pirates detected on attack vector! pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile fighters eliminated. pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: The relic transport has left the Yavin system.
entries.failed_destroy: The transport and all salvage on board has been lost! Return to base immediately.
entries.failed_protect: The transport has left the area prematurely! This mission is over.
entries.found_loc: Travel to the rendezvous waypoint and wait for the transport to arrive.
entries.goodbye_1: Our lightspeed vector is locked in. Thanks for the escort.
entries.goodbye_2: Preparing for lightspeed jump. Thanks for the escort.
entries.goodbye_3: Hyperspace coordinates locked in. Safe travels, pilot.
entries.goodbye_4: Our lightspeed vector is locked in. Thanks for the escort.
entries.goodbye_5: Preparing for lightspeed jump. Thanks for the escort.
entries.hull_half: I'm tracking multiple hull breaches! I can't take much more damage. Help!
entries.panic_1: Scavengers are moving in to attack!
entries.panic_3: It looks like those scavengers mean business.
entries.panic_4: Keep them off of me. I cannot last long against them.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the freighter until it reaches its jump point. Be on the look out for the Debris Cult who will most likely try to destroy the freighter rather then see their debris leave the area.
entries.quest_location_d: Meet the salvage freighters inside of the Yavin system. You will receive a navigation waypoint to the meeting point of your assigned freighter.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the navigation waypoint and wait for the freighter to be ready for departure.
entries.reason_1: We need to move this salvage to a safe location for processing. Keep your eyes peeled for pirates.
entries.reason_2: We need to move this salvage to a safe location for processing. Keep your eyes peeled for pirates.
entries.reason_3: We need to move this salvage to a safe location for processing. Keep your eyes peeled for pirates.
entries.reason_4: We need to move this salvage to a safe location for processing. Keep your eyes peeled for pirates.
entries.reason_5: We need to move this salvage to a safe location for processing. Keep your eyes peeled for pirates.
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are out. Get them off of me!
entries.taunt_2: The debris you picked up belongs to us.
entries.taunt_4: You have violated this holy place.
entries.taunt_5: Prepare to become one with the debris field.
entries.thanks_2: That should keep those scavengers thinking for a while.
entries.thanks_3: I am glad that you are out here.
entries.thanks_4: Well done! You are a credit to the Empire.
entries.title: Yavin System: Protect the Imperial Salvage Freighters Duty
entries.title_d: The Empire salvage operation has been filling numerous cargo freighters with the salvaged pieces of the Death Star. These freighters are then sent out of the system to other areas of Imperial interest. The Debris Cult, who believe that all Death Star debris is theirs by devine right, have been attacking these cargo freighters and taking the scrap for their own. The Empire wants these ships protected as they leave the region.
